translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on Pairs🔽The Dyad on the With-Resultant🔽With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-outflow dhammas.

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)🔽8.47. Upādinnaduka🔽Naupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  upādinna duka  na aupādinnam dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-without-outflow dhammas.🔽With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-without-outflow dhammas.🔽With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow dhammas.🔽With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow-without-outflow dhammas.

original: Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṁ
analyzed: na anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca na anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anupādinna
translated: With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-without-outflow dhammas.🔽With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow-without-outflow dhammas.

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽naupādinno ca naanupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca  na aupādinnaḥ ca na anupādinnaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow dhammas.🔽With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow-without-outflow dhammas.🔽With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow dhammas.

original: Naupādinnañca naanupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupādinnam ca na anupādinnam ca dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow-without-outflow dhammas.🔽With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow dhammas.🔽With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow-without-outflow dhammas.🔽With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow dhammas.

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)🔽Mahantaradukaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā ekam pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro 🔽mahantara dukam niṭṭhita
translated: With-resultant dhammas are a condition, as root-cause condition, for resultant-with-resultant-with-outflow
